name: Dodgeball Strike!
description:
Fun!

Have a blast while fighting enemies with a futuristic theme!

if you have a monitor, you can enjoy the fun with two people!*

With gamemodes like:

Rumble

And regular!

select your hats, more each week.

*Make sure monitor is set to extend and you launch the game like that, then press the add ps4 con button at the top. must have a ps4 controller connected whether usb or bluetooth with ds4 as dualshock preset.
